title: 4.1 Master Challenge 1
question:
Create an interactive grid using div elements, consisting of 6 rows and 5 columns.Each cell in the grid should be a div element. When the user clicks on a cell, the selected cell should be highlighted, and the cell number should be displayed below the grid. If the user clicks on the same cell again, the highlight and cell number should disappear.
Additionally, create two buttons: Enable and Disable. When the user clicks the Enable button, the interactive grid feature should be active, allowing the user to click on the cells. When the user clicks the Disable button, the interactive grid feature should be turned off, and users should no longer be able to click on the cells or see any highlights or cell numbers.
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - scratch - javascript - R - pseudocode - java

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
